definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: shine out or forth, send out beams, cause to shine (NH id., in fig. Senses; Targum [[יְפַע]]; As. Shaph. šûpu, shine, cause to shine, glorify, Lotz:TP Col. Vii. 93 Zim:BP 97, 105 SAS:Asrb. ii. 18; cf. Ar. waf9un adificium elatum; kindered seem to be yafa9a ascendit montem, adults fuit; Sab. [[יפע]] raise, heighten Os:ZMG 1865, 210 f., [[יפע]] name of a temple DHM:ZMG 1883, 350)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹפִיעַ]] De 33:2, Ps 50:2; [[וְהוֹפִיעַ]] consec. Job 37:15; 2 ms. [[הוֹפָָעְתָּ]] Job 10:3; Impf. 3 fs. [[תּוֹפַע]] Job 3:4; [[וַתּ֫וֹפַע]] Job 10:22; Imv. [[הוֹפִיעַ]] Ps 94:1; [[הוֹפִ֫יעָה]] Ps 80:2; —
shine out, forth, display beans: of ´[[י]] De 33:2, Ps 50:2, Ps 80:2, Ps 94:1, Job 10:3 (sq. [[עַל]]); subj. [[נְהָרָה]] light Job 3:4; Job 10:22 [[וַתּׂפַע כְּמוֹ אׂפֶל]] (of She' ôl).
cause to shine [[וְהוֹפִיעַ אוֹר עֲנׇנוֹ]] Job 37:15, subj. ´[[י]].
